mapping.statustypen: [{% for phase in instance.phases %}{% set phase = phase|merge({'_catalogus': _catalogus, '_zaaktypeIdentificatie': instance.legacy.zaaktype_id}) %}{% if not loop.first %},{% endif %}{{ executeMapping(7, phase)|json_encode }}{% endfor %}]
mapping.informatieobjecttypen: [{% set index=0 %}{% for phase in instance.phases %}{% for field in phase.fields %}{% if field.type == 'file' %}{% set field = field|merge({'_catalogus': _catalogus, '_zaaktypeIdentificatie': instance.legacy.zaaktype_id}) %}{% if index != 0 %},{% endif %}{{ executMapping(8, field)|json_encode }}{% set index=index+1 %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% endfor %}]
mapping.eigenschappen: [{% set index=0 %}{% for phase in instance.phases %}{% for field in phase.fields %}{% if field.type != 'file' %}{% set field = field|merge({'_catalogus': _catalogus, '_zaaktypeIdentificatie': instance.legacy.zaaktype_id}) %}{% if index != 0 %},{% endif %}{{ executMapping(9, field)|json_encode }}{% set index=index+1 %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% endfor %}]
mapping.roltypen: [{% set index=0 %}{% for phase in instance.phases %}{% if phase.route.role|default %}{% set role = phase.route.role|merge({'_catalogus': _catalogus, '_zaaktypeIdentificatie': instance.legacy.zaaktype_id}) %}{% if index != 0 %},{% endif %}{{ executMapping(10, role)|json_encode }}{% set index=index+1 %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}]
mapping.resultaattypen: [{% if instance.results|default %}{% for result in instance.results %}{% set result = result|merge({'_catalogus': _catalogus, '_zaaktypeIdentificatie': instance.legacy.zaaktype_id}) %}{% if not loop.first %},{% endif %}{{ executMapping(11, result)|json_encode }}{% endfor %}{% endif %}]
